00055 
00056 void selectionFinishCallback( void * userData, SoSelection* selection )
00057 {
00058         Trace trace( "selectionFinishCallback", false );
00059     Document* document = static_cast< Document* >( userData  );
00060     if ( document ) document->selectionFinishCBAux( selection );
00061 }
00062 
00063 Document::Document()
00064 : m_root(0), m_scene(0), m_isModified(false)
00065 {
00066     Trace trace( "Document::Document" );
00067         m_root = new SoSelection;
00068         m_root->ref();
00069 
00070     m_root->policy = SoSelection::SINGLE;
00071     m_root->addFinishCallback( selectionFinishCallback, static_cast< void*>( this ) );
00072 
00073     InitializeScene();
00074 }
00075 
00076 Document::~Document()
00077 {
00078         Trace trace( "Document::~Document" );
00079         if ( m_root ) m_root->unref();
00080 }
00081 
00082 void Document::SetDocumentModified( bool status )
00083 {
00084     Trace trace( "Document::SetDocumentModified" );
00085     m_isModified = status;
00086 }
00087 
00088 void Document::InitializeScene()
00089 {
00090     Trace trace( "Document::InitializeScene", false );
00091         if ( m_scene ) ClearScene();
00092 
00093         m_scene = new SoSceneKit;
00094         m_root->addChild( m_scene );
00095     m_scene->setSearchingChildren( true );
00096 }
00097 
00098 void Document::New()
00099 {
00100     Trace trace( "Document::New", false );
00101         InitializeScene();
00102         m_isModified = false;
00103 }
00104 
00105 void Document::ClearScene()
00106 {
00107     Trace trace( "Document::ClearScene", false );
00108     if( m_root )
00109     {
00110         if ( m_scene )
00111         {
00112             if ( m_root ) m_root->removeChild( m_scene );
00113                 if ( m_scene ) while ( m_scene->getRefCount( ) > 1 ) m_scene->unref();
00114         }
00115     }
00116 
00117     m_scene = 0;
00118 }
00119 
00120 bool Document::ReadFile( const QString& fileName )
00121 {
00122     Trace trace( "Document::ReadFile" );
00123         if( SoSceneKit* inputScene = GetSceneKitFromFile( fileName ) )
00124         {
00125         if ( m_scene ) ClearScene();
00126             m_scene = inputScene;
00127             m_root->addChild( m_scene );
00128             m_scene->setSearchingChildren( true );
00129             m_isModified = false;
00130             return true;
00131         }
00132         return false;
00133 }
00134 
00135 bool Document::WriteFile( const QString& fileName )
00136 {
00137     Trace trace( "Document::WriteFile" );
00138     SoWriteAction SceneOuput;
00139     if ( !SceneOuput.getOutput()->openFile( fileName.toLatin1().constData() ) )
00140         {
00141         QMessageBox::warning( 0, tr( "Tonatiuh" ),
00142                               tr( "Cannot open file %1:\n%2. " )
00143                             .arg( fileName ));
00144                 return false;
00145         }
00146 
00147     QApplication::setOverrideCursor( Qt::WaitCursor );
00148         SceneOuput.getOutput()->setBinary( false );
00149         SceneOuput.apply( m_scene );
00150         SceneOuput.getOutput()->closeFile();
00151         QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
00152         m_isModified = false;
00153         return true;
00154 }
00155 
00156 bool Document::IsModified( )
00157 {
00158     Trace trace( "Document::IsModified" );
00159     return m_isModified;
00160 }
00161 
00162 SoSelection* Document::GetRoot() const
00163 {
00164     Trace trace( "Document::GetRoot" );
00165         return m_root;
00166 }
00167 
00168 SoSceneKit* Document::GetSceneKit() const
00169 {
00170     Trace trace( "Document::GetSceneKit" );
00171     return m_scene;
00172 }
00173 
00174 
00175 SoSceneKit* Document::GetSceneKitFromFile( const QString& fileName )
00176 {
00177     Trace trace( "Document::GetSceneKitFromFile" );
00178         SoInput sceneInput;
00179         if ( !sceneInput.openFile( fileName.toLatin1().constData() ) )
00180         {
00181         QMessageBox::warning( 0, tr( "Scene Graph Structure" ),
00182                               tr( "Cannot open file %1:\n%2." )
00183                             .arg( fileName ) );
00184                 return 0;
00185         }
00186 
00187         SoSeparator* graphSeparator = SoDB::readAll( &sceneInput );
00188         sceneInput.closeFile();
00189 
00190         if ( !graphSeparator )
00191         {
00192         QMessageBox::warning( 0, tr( "Scene Graph Structure" ),
00193                               tr( "Error reading file %1:\n%2." )
00194                              .arg( fileName ) );
00195                 return 0;
00196         }
00197 
00198    return static_cast< SoSceneKit* >( graphSeparator->getChild(0) );
00199 }
00200 
00201 void Document::selectionFinishCBAux( SoSelection* selection )
00202 {
00203     Trace trace( "Document::selectionFinishCBAux", false );
00204         emit selectionFinish( selection );
00205 }
